channel.title: Dragon slayer quest development
channel.description:
UPDATED: (see below) I included quest notes, npcTalk, playertalk, if you need a picture guide download the pdf. I found the broken ship and built ships.. (4 total) Broken boat (No ned), Broken boat (Ned), Fixed boat (Ned in it), Fixed boat (fixed boat at kamarji) Found IDS of chests and objects, missing objects include: the holes (to the boat) and ladders
VIDEOs: (to help you thru quest) Part 1: http://youtu.be/dSsfwUL3ORk Part 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fN3iwRnQ1oo Part 3: http://youtu.be/vICOs7QaS3s Part 4: http://youtu.be/koisS_oGC2c
1) Dragon slayer... (more to come...

item.title: Dragon slayer quest development
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

Who ever made the xml on for easy rsc got the objectids mixed up between trees and doors…but i guess well have to id the doors as 1…

MAZE DOORS:

1st floor

<GameObjectLoc> <id>1</id> <x>337</x> <y>632</y> <direction>1</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1</id> <x>346</x> <y>636</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1</id> <x>348</x> <y>635</y> <direction>1</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1</id> <x>348</x> <y>632</y> <direction>1</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1</id> <x>348</x> <y>629</y> <direction>1</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1</id> <x>340</x> <y>630</y> <direction>1</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc>

item.title: Dragon slayer quest development

item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

xrune:

alot of stuff to post and think of when u make the quest… zilent had an easier way to make the quests when he was a dev… pretty basic… its mostly jus the NpcTalk and the choices given to you by the npcs and your options…

Thanks a lot, that will save a lot of time to ppl doing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon slayer quest development
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
::::::::::::::::::::::Dragon Slayer::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Missing information:
*need to talk to guild master in champions guild.
*need to see what happens if u loose your anti dragon breath shield what duke says.
*talk to klarense after u fix ship
*Talk to Ned before I fix ship, what he says
*Need answers 3 answers from Ned after I fix ship… theres 2 cases one if you own the ship already and one if u don’t, i have the one that i own the ship already.
*Repair ship on crandor island after it crashes what happens with ned and what he says)

*Items for quest: (item #):

ID: 421(maze key)
ID: 390(red key)	
ID: 391(orange key)
ID: 392(yellow key)
ID: 393(blue key)
ID: 394(magenta key)
ID: 395(black key)
ID: 416(Map piece)
ID: 417(Map piece)
ID: 418(Map piece)
ID: 415(completed map piece) (all map pieces combine 416+417+418=415)
ID: 375(lobster pot)
ID: 340(unfired bowl)
ID: 200(silk)
ID: 268(wizard mind bomb)
ID: 420(Anti dragon breath sheild)
ID: 10(coins)--- ****2,000 coins for the boat****
ID: 410(plank)---- ****3 planks to repair ship****
ID  168(hammer)--------- to hammer nails
ID: 419(nails)---- ****12 nails to repair ship****

*Npcs for quest that drop keys and map pieces:

ID: 47(rat) ----- level 13 rats 
ID: 53(ghost) -------- level 25 ghosts (2nd floor of maze)
ID: 45(skeleton) ----- level 31 skeletons (3rd floor of maze)
ID: 214(zombie) ----------- level 32 zombies(basement of maze)
ID: 182(melzar the mad)-------- level 45
ID: 181(lesser demon)---------- level 79
ID: 192(wormbrain)----- drops piece of map
ID: 187(ozaich)----------- gives you maze key
ID: 197(oracle)-------- tests your wisdom
ID: 198(duke of lumbridge)------- gives you anti dragon breath sheild
ID: 193(klarense)------------ offers to sell you ship
ID: 124(Ned)------------- offers to sail your ship
ID 196(Dragon)----------- level 110 completes quest after u slay it

*Objects: chest (melzars maze: bottom floor) (will need to figure out which chest/hole it is):

 ID:228 chest-------down in melzars maze-----needs to be faced in a opposite direction (X:344,Y:3458)
     ID:230 chest--------down in drawf mine (x:255, Y:3331)
     ID:58 Strange looking wall--------kamarji access to 54 skeletons and lessers (X:406,Y:3518)
     ID:59 door---------to dragons lair (X:413,Y:3480), (X:412,y:3480)

Missing Objects:

     ID: 226 (Hole)---------- coords X:280,Y:3472 broken part of ship, docked at port sarim (needs to be implemented)
     ID:232 (Hole)---------- coords X:258, Y:3472 broken part of ship, docked at Crandor (needs to be implemented)
 ID: 227 Ladder---------coords X:281, Y:3473 (needs implemented)
     ID:227 Ladder---------coords X:259, Y:3473 (needs implemented)
     ID:227 Ladder---------coords X:281, Y:3494 (needs implemented)
     ID:227 Ladder---------coords X:259, Y:3494 (needs implemented)

ID: doors(maze)-----red key: 1st floor :opens all doors on the 1st floor
ID: doors(maze)-----orange key: 2nd floor: opens all doors on the 2nd floor
ID: doors(maze)-----yellow key: 3rd floor: opens all doors on the 3rd floor
ID: doors(maze)-----Blue key: bottom floor: opens 2 doors on bottom floor
ID: doors(maze)-----magenta key: bottom floor: opens 1 door on the bottom floor
ID: doors(maze)-----black key: bottom floor: opens 1 door on the bottom floor

This section will be done in parts:

Quest Notes: (checklist as your doing it)

  1. Close strange looking wall on kamarji at coords(X:406,Y:3518) until after u complete the dragon quest, then make it openable by players
  2. Implement the ladders and holes on broken ships and on built ships:
    ID:227 Ladder---------coords X:281, Y:3473 needs implemented
    ID:227 Ladder---------coords X:259, Y:3473 needs implemented
    ID:227 Ladder---------coords X:281, Y:3494 needs implemented
    ID:227 Ladder---------coords X:259, Y:3494 needs implemented
    ID:226 (Hole)---------- coords X:280,Y:3472 broken part of ship, docked at port sarim needs implemented
    ID:232 (Hole)---------- coords X:258, Y:3472 broken part of ship, docked at Crandor needs implemented
  3. Broken boat 1 ladder(port sarim): teleports you to coords X:260 ,Y:642, broken Boat 2 ladder teleports you to coords       X:408 Y:639, fixed boat 1 teleports you (port sarim) x:280, 3494, fixed boat 2(kamarji fixed boat) x:558, y:3494
  4. 32 quest points are needed to start quest
  5. Map pieces need to be added to these chests: (quest stages)
    ID:228 chest-------down in melzars maze-----needs to be faced in a opposite direction (X:344,Y:3458)
    ID:230 chest--------down in drawf mine (x:255, Y:3331)
  6. Door to dragons lair (X:413,Y:3480) needs to be closed after u kill dragon
  7. Oziach: ID(187) needs needs spawned at coords: (X:243,Y:444)
  8. Skeletons level 31 need spawned at coords: (X: 346, Y: 2517) id say about 5 of em…
  9. Level 13 rats drop red key, level 25 ghosts drop orange key, level 31 skeletons drop yellow key, level 32 zombies drops blue key, level 45 melzar the mad drops magenta key, and level 79 lesser demon drops the black key (drop rate varies)…
  10. oracle: ID(197), needs to be spawned at coords:(X: 286,Y: 456)
  11. ID: 192 Wormbrain drops map piece (item drop map piece: ID: 418)
  12. You must hold the following items to enter door at coords (X:259 ,Y:3334 ) in drawf mine : Item IDS: 375, 340, 200, 268
  13. spawn Klarense: ID(193) at coords: (X:260,Y:641)
  14. Using planks ID(410) , steel nails ID(419), hammer ID(168) to fix hole in boat: (Coords X: , Y: ) i have yet to find the location of the broken ship and the repaired ship…
  15. Need to find location of broken ship (X,Y)
  16. Teleport Ned ID (124)to coords:(X: ,Y: ) inside ship
  17. If u leave boat after talking to Ned, u get teleported to crandor island once you leave boat and head to the dragon… (X:408, Y:639)
  18. After you Kill dragon you get teleported out of lair to coords: (X:411, Y: 3480)

Part 1:

Talk to Oziach:

	[code]public void run() {
	npcTalk("So how is thy quest going?");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"So where can I find this dragon?", "Where can I get an antidragon shield?"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		finddragon();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		shield();
	}
}
	private void finddragon() {
	NpcTalk("That is a problem too yes");
	NpcTalk("No one knows where the Isle of Crandor is located");
	NpcTalk("There was a map");
	NpcTalk("But it was torn up into three pieces");
	NpcTalk("Which are now scattered across Asgarnia");
	NpcTalk("You'll also struggle to find someone bold enough to take a ship to Crandor Island");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Where is the first piece of map?", "Where is the second piece of map?", "Where is the third piece of map?", "Where can i get an antidragon shield?"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		firstpiece();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		secondpiece();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		thirdpiece();
	} else if(choice == 3) {
		shield();
	}
}
	private void firstpiece() {
	NpcTalk("deep in a strange building known as Melzar's maze");
	NpcTalk("Located north west of Rimmington");
	NpcTalk("You will need this to get in");
	NpcTalk("This is the key to the front entrance to the maze");
	sendmessage("Oziach hands you a key");
-------------	Player Recieves item: 421------------------
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Where can i get an antidragon shield", "Where is the second piece of map?", "Where is the third piece of map?", "Ok I'll try and get everything together"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		shield();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		secondpiece();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		thirdpiece();
	} else if(choice == 3) {
		  together();
	}
}
	private void secondpiece() {
	NpcTalk("You will need to talk to the oracle on the ice mountain");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Where can i get an antidragon shield", "Where is the first piece of map?", "Where is the third piece of map?", "Ok I'll try and get everything together"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		shield();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		firstpiece();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		thirdpiece();
	} else if(choice == 3) {
		  together();
	}
}
	private void thirdpiece() {
	NpcTalk("That was stolen by one of the goblins from goblin village");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Where can i get an antidragon shield", "Where is the first piece of map?", "Where is the second piece of map?", "Ok I'll try and get everything together"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		shield();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		firstpiece();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		secondpiece();
	} else if(choice == 3) {
		  together();
	}
}
	private void shield() {
	npcTalk("I believe the Duke of Lumbridge Castle may have one 			in his armoury");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"So where can I find this dragon?", "Ok I'll try and get everything together"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		finddragon();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		together();
	}
}
	private void together() {
	NpcTalk("Fare ye well");
	}
}[/code]

Part 2

::::::::::MAZE:::::::::

CHEST: (X:,Y:)

Melzar Maze map piece: ID(416)

Part 3

Talk to oracle

	[code]public void run() {
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"I seek a piece of the map of the Isle of Crandor", "Can you impart your wise knowledge to me oh oracle"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		seekmap();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		knowledge();
	}
}
	private void seekmap() {
	NpcTalk("The map's behind a door below");
	NpcTalk("But entering is rather tough");
	NpcTalk("And this is what you need to know");
	NpcTalk("You must hold the following stuff");
	NpcTalk("First a drink used by the mage");
	NpcTalk("Next some worm string changed to sheet");
	NpcTalk("Then a small crustacean cage");
	NpcTalk("Last a bowl that's not seen heat");
	}
}	
	private void knowledge() {
	NpcTalk("You must search from within to find your true destiny");
	}
}[/code]

Part 4

Search Chest (drawf mine):

Part 5

Talk to Duke of Lumbridge: (X:131,Y:1603)

	[code]public void run() {
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"I seek a shield that will protect me from dragon breath", "Have you any quests for me?", "Where can i find money?"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		seekshield();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		quests();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		money();
	}
}	
	private void seekshield() {
	NpcTalk("A knight going on a dragon quest hmm?");
	NpcTalk("A most worthy cause");
	NpcTalk("Guard this well my friend");
	sendmessage("The duke hands you a shield");
--------------player recieves item ID: 420----------------
	}
}	
	private void quests() {
	NpcTalk("All is well for me");
	}
}		
	private void money() {
	NpcTalk("I've heard the blacksmiths are prosperous amoung the peasantry");
	NpcTalk("Maybe you could try your hand at that");
	}
}[/code]

Part 6

Talk to Klarense:

	[code]public void run() {
	NpcTalk("You're interested in a trip on the Lumbridge Lady are we?");
	NpcTalk("I admit she looks fine, but she isn't seaworthy right now");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Do you know when she will be seaworthy", "Would you take me to Crandor Isle when it's ready?", "I don't suppose I could buy it?", "Ah well,nevermind"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		seaworthy();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		takeme();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		buyit();
	} else if(choice == 3) {
		nevermind();
	}
}	
	private void seaworthy() {
	NpcTalk("No not really");
	NpcTalk("Port Sarim's shipbuilders aren't very efficient");
	NpcTalk("So it could be quite a while");
	}
}		
	private void takeme() {
	NpcTalk("Well even if I knew how to get there");
	NpcTalk("I wouldn't like to risk it");
	NpcTalk("Especially after to goin to all the effort of fixing the old girl up");
	}
}			
	private void buyit() {
	NpcTalk("I guess you could");
	NpcTalk("I'm sure the work needed to do on it wouldn't be too expensive");
	NpcTalk("How does 2000 gold sound for a price?");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Yep sounds good", "I'm not paying that much for a broken boat"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		good();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		noboat();
	}
}	
	private void good() {
	NpcTalk("Ok she's all yours");
	}
}	
	private void noboat() {
	NpcTalk("That's Ok, I didn't particulary want to sell anyway");
	}
}		

	private void nevermind() {
	}
}[/code]

Part 7

Talking to Klarense after buying boat: (STAGE 2 KLARENSE)

	[code]public void run() {
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"So would you like to sail this ship to Crandor Isle for me?", "So what needs fixing on this ship?", "What are you going to do now you don't have a ship?"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		sailme();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		fixship();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		noship();
	}
}	
	private void sailme() {
	NpcTalk("No not me, I'm frightened of dragons");
	}
}		
	private void fixship() {
	NpcTalk("Well the big gaping hole in the hold is the main problem");
	NpcTalk("you'll need a few planks");
	NpcTalk("Hammered with steel nails");
	}
}		
	private void noship() {
	NpcTalk("Oh I'll be fine");
	NpcTalk("I've got work as Port Sarim's first life guard");
	}
}[/code]

Part 8

Using planks on ship and hammering the nails into the (hole) ID ?.. each plank is done 1 by 1… so this is how it goes:

1st plank

sendmessage("You hammer the plank over the hole"); sendmessage("You still need more planks to close the hole completely");
2nd plank

sendmessage("You hammer the plank over the hole"); sendmessage("You still need more planks to close the hole completely");
3rd plank

sendmessage("You hammer the plank over the hole"); sendmessage("You <a href='http://pcjiasu.com/text/?keyword=<a href='http://pcjiasu.com/text/?keyword=<a href='http://pcjiasu.com/text/?keyword=<a href='http://pcjiasu.com/text/?keyword=<a href='http://pcjiasu.com/text/?keyword=<a href='http://pcjiasu.com/text/?keyword=<a href='http://pcjiasu.com/text/?keyword=<a href='http://pcjiasu.com/text/?keyword=<a href='http://pcjiasu.com/text/?keyword=<a href='http://pcjiasu.com/text/?keyword=<a href='http://pcjiasu.com/text/?keyword=board' title='Click to Continue - Fast Free Converter' style=''>board</a>' title='Click to Continue - Fast Free Converter' style=''>board</a>' title='Click to Continue - Fast Free Converter' style=''>board</a>' style=''>board</a>' style=''>board</a>' style=''>board</a>' style=''>board</a>' style=''>board</a>' style=''>board</a>' style=''>board</a>' style=''>board</a> up the hole in the ship");

Part 9

Talk to Ned: ID (124) at coords: (X:216 ,Y: 626) NEED 3 answers
	
	[code]public void run() {
	NpcTalk("Why hello there, mt friends call me Ned");
	NpcTalk("I was a man of the sea, but its past me now");
	NpcTalk("Could I be making or selling you some Rope?");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"You're a sailor? Could you take me to the Isle of Crandor", "Yes, I would like some Rope", "No thanks Ned, I don't need any"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		takeme();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		rope();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		nothanks();
	}
}

Case 1---------------TODO NEED PART if player hasnt bought ship yet, what Ned says------------------------
private void takeme() {
NpcTalk(“Well I was a sailor”);
NpcTalk(“I’ve not been able to get work at sea these days though”);
NpcTalk(“They say I am too old”);
sendmessage(“There is a wistfull look in Ned’s eyes”);
NpcTalk(“I miss those days”);
NpcTalk(“If you could get me a ship I would take you anywhere”);
---------------------TODO NEED PART-------------------------
Case 2:----------------------------------------------completed-----------------------
private void takeme() {
NpcTalk(“Well I was a sailor”);
NpcTalk(“I’ve not been able to get work at sea these days though”);
NpcTalk(“They say I am too old”);
sendmessage(“There is a wistfull look in Ned’s eyes”);
NpcTalk(“I miss those days”);
NpcTalk(“If you could get me a ship I would take you anywhere”);
playerTalk(“As it happens I do have a ship ready to sail”);
NpcTalk(“That’d be grand, where is it”);
}
}
private void rope() {
--------------------TODO NEED ANSWERS ------------------
}
}
private void nothanks() {
--------------------TODO NEED ANSWERS ------------------
}
}[/code]

Part 10

    player needs to have map ID(415) in inventory when talking to Ned

Talk to Ned in ship --------------------i have yet to find where the ship is located ....

	[code]public void run() {
	NpcTalk("Hello there lad");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"So are you going to take me to Crandor Island now then?", "So are you still up to sailing this ship?"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		takecrandor();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		sailship();
	}
}	
	private void takecrandor() {
	NpcTalk("Ok show me the map and we'll set sail now");
	sendmessage("You give the map to ned");
	playerTalk("Here it is");
	sendmessage("You feel the ship begin to move");
	sendmessage("You are out at sea");
	sendmessage("The ship is sailing");
	sendmessage("The ship is sailing");
	sendmessage("You feel a crunch");
	NpcTalk("Aha we've arrived");
	}
}		
	private void sailship() {
	NpcTalk("Well I am a tad rusty");
	NpcTalk("I'm sure it'll all come back to me, once I get into action");
	NpcTalk("I hope...");
	}
}[/code]

Part 11

Ship is broken on crandor island now…

*If you talk to Ned after the ship crashes then:

	[code]public void run() {
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Is the ship ready to sail back?", "So are you enjoying this exotic island vacation?"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		sailback();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		enjoying();
	}
}	
	private void sailback() {
	NpcTalk("Well when we arrived the ship took a nasty jar from those rocks");
	NpcTalk("We maybe stranded");
	}
}	
	private void enjoying() {
	NpcTalk("Well it would have been better if I'd brought my sun lotion");
	NpcTalk("Oh and the skeletons which won't let me leave the ship");
	NpcTalk("Probably aren't helping either");
	}
}[/code]

Part 12

After you kill dragon, quest complete:

 19,250 Defence exp 
About 20,000 Strength exp 
The right to wear a Rune Plate Mail Body

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon slayer quest development
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

This quest needs a lot of work if using rsca/msc, there is missing objects, npcs, messed up maze doors etc. and those events inside the quest regardless of quest stage…

item.title: Dragon slayer quest development
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

UPDATED: (see below)
I included quest notes, npcTalk, playertalk, if you need a picture guide download the pdf.
I found the broken ship and built ships… (4 total) Broken boat (No ned), Broken boat (Ned), Fixed boat (Ned in it), Fixed boat (fixed boat at kamarji) Found IDS of chests and objects, missing objects include: the holes (to the boat) and ladders
